title: Fix application startup error

requirements.text: Investigate and fix the error that occurs when the Calma-Mente app initializes or loads for the first time
acceptanceCriteria: The app loads without errors on initial startup
Users can access the welcome screen without encountering errors
Console logs show no critical errors during app initialization
All routes (welcome, home, breathing, diary) load successfully

requirements.text: Verify that Internet Identity authentication initializes correctly without errors on app startup
acceptanceCriteria: Identity persistence and delegation validation work correctly
No authentication-related errors appear in the console during startup

requirements.text: Ensure backend actor connection is established successfully on app initialization
acceptanceCriteria: Backend actor is created without errors
Initial queries (motivational messages, diary entries) execute successfully
Network requests to the canister complete without failures

requirements.text: Verify that React Query initialization and provider setup work correctly without errors
acceptanceCriteria: React Query hooks initialize without errors
Query invalidation and refetching work as expected

constraints: Do not modify the Internet Identity authentication flow in useInternetIdentity.ts
Preserve existing backend actor creation logic in useActor.ts
Keep the current routing structure in App.tsx intact
